title: TIL, GD is starting a new "feminist" movement.
body:
"Omg I'm a guy, I'm so deprived of emotions and weakness. Society has fucked me."

How is this shit not just as bad as the Feminist Nazi's that are attacking everything? 
You guys are literally falling into the same fucking hole that feminists have, trying to blame women on everything and act like you are a victim.

Let me clue you in on something. Society at no point in time is ever going to be perfect, in fact it is be corrupted forever. Both men and women gets shit on at in certain situations, and if you cannot see that... you need to look at other individual's perspectives.

If you feel you are not respected because of your gender, associate with different people. Do not just whine about shit over the internet. For instance, If you are feminist go do something to help women, not put down men like helping out at a battered women shelter. Ascend your fucking gender, don't battle it out like old rich politicians and bring down the other side. Men are not a hivemind, and so are women. Everybody acts different and by thinking the world is so black and white is going to cause so many issues for you in the future.

Jesus, so many people get offended and bitch now a days. When 70 years ago countries were being bombed and people were slaughtered based on their religion. Welcome to life.
